title: Delete Columns to Make Sorted
content:
We are given an array  of  lowercase letter strings, all of the same length.
Now, we may choose any set of deletion indices, and for each string, we delete all the characters in those indices.
For example, if we have an array  and deletion indices , then the final array after deletions is , and the remaining columns of  are , , and .  (Formally, the -th column is ).
Suppose we chose a set of deletion indices  such that after deletions, each remaining column in A is in non-decreasing sorted order.
Return the minimum possible value of .
